properties.name: Columbia University
properties.description: Posted by JerryColumbia University is a private university and a member of the Ivy League. Established in 1754 as King\'s College and is the fifth oldest chartered institution of higher education in the United States. Alumni or almost-alumni include Alexander Hamilton, John Jay, Li Lu, Alan Greenspan, James Meredith, Barack Obama, both Teddy and FD Roosevelt, Warren Buffet, Henry Kravis, John Jacob Astor, John Ashberry, Isaac Asimov, Jack Kerouac, Alan Ginsberg, Upton Sinclair, JD Salinger, Carson McCullers, Langston Hughes, Bela Bartok, Roger Zelazny, Herman Wouk, Art Garfunkel, Lauryn Hill, Tony Kushner, Rogers and Hammerstein, Stephen Jay Gould, Robert Moog, Ben Graham, Benjamin Spock, John Backus, Jacques Barzun, Robert Nozick, John Dewey, Joseph Campbell, Margaret Mead, Lou Gehrig and Sandy Koufax.
